analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x7d10b16dd1f9e0df45976d402879fb496c114936.sol#85-103) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x7d10b16dd1f9e0df45976d402879fb496c114936.sol#97-102)

AidCoinIco.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x7d10b16dd1f9e0df45976d402879fb496c114936.sol#420-456) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x7d10b16dd1f9e0df45976d402879fb496c114936.sol#450-452)

AidCoinIco.airdrop (/unique_chucks/5/0x7d10b16dd1f9e0df45976d402879fb496c114936.sol#538-558) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(to,tokensToAirdrop) (/unique_chucks/5/0x7d10b16dd1f9e0df45976d402879fb496c114936.sol)

AidCoinIco.airdrop has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(to,tokensToAirdrop) (/unique_chucks/5/0x7d10b16dd1f9e0df45976d402879fb496c114936.sol)
